svcproc.title: STOP ARM ADJUSTMENT VALVE (AIR ACTUATION)
svcproc.para: The stop arm adjustment valve is located behind the electrical service door, below the driver's window ( Figure 19). Do not attempt to adjust the stop arm pressure without the red flasher lights flashing. The stop arm should extend to 90 degrees. To increase or decrease the air pressure, locate the lock retainer on top of the pressure regulator. Rotate clockwise to increase, and counter clockwise to decrease. Then depress the lock retainer.
